data.text: @FoxNews Don't know if we should be glad or sad,one side you have"Rapist",other side is Gloria a screaming"Witch",can see how jurors were conflicted!

@kan3xiao @FoxNews No one tried to be witty. The weak attempt was by the prosecution. The facts did not line up well. No racism involved.

@br0k3nHalo @FoxNews Some might see this as the saving grace for many who have been wrongly accused. Be careful what you wish for. We need better prosecutors.
